summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CustodyKeeper calendar enhancements and dashboard clickable events. Backend APIs 100% working, frontend 85% functional with modal overlay issue on Contacts page.

ui_bugs.issue: DialogOverlay with z-[100] intercepts pointer events on 'Add Contact' and 'Update Contact' buttons - cannot submit form via UI

issues: Missing aria-describedby attribute - console warning but not critical

passed_tests: Backend: Calendar CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
Backend: Calendar event types - visitation, medical, school available (parenting_time/exchange correctly removed)
Backend: Calendar children selection - works correctly
Backend: Calendar custom_color for group events - works correctly
Backend: Violations CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
Backend: Journals CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
Backend: Contacts CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working via API
Frontend: Dashboard loads with stats and upcoming events
Frontend: Dashboard clickable events - Opens detail dialog with title, date, location, notes
Frontend: Dashboard 'Edit in Calendar' button present in event dialog
Frontend: Calendar page loads with monthly view
Frontend: Calendar event types dropdown - Shows Visitation, Medical, School (NO parenting_time/exchange)
Frontend: Calendar children selection UI - Can select Emma/Jack with colored indicators
Frontend: Calendar edit event - Form populates correctly with existing data
Frontend: Calendar single child events show in child's color
Frontend: Violations page - Edit button works, form populates correctly
Frontend: Journal page - Edit button works, form populates correctly
Frontend: Contacts page - Edit button exists, form opens (modal overlay issue blocks submission)
action_items: FIX (HIGH): Contacts page modal overlay blocking form submission - DialogOverlay z-[100] intercepting pointer events
critical_code_review_comments: ContactsPage.jsx: Dialog component should use proper portal or lower z-index for overlay to prevent pointer event interception
All Dialog components missing aria-describedby attribute (low priority, console warning only)
seed_data_creation: Created test violations and journals for testing. Contacts creation failed due to modal overlay issue.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs are fully working. Main issue is Contacts page modal overlay blocking button clicks. Calendar, Violations, Journal edit functionality all verified working. The DialogOverlay component in shadcn/ui Dialog needs z-index adjustment or pointer-events: none to fix the Contacts page issue.

rca_of_the_issue.root_cause: DialogOverlay component has class 'fixed inset-0 z-[100] bg-white' with pointer-events intercepting clicks on buttons inside the dialog
reproduction_steps: 4. Try to click 'Add Contact' submit button
5. Click is intercepted by DialogOverlay div
rca_of_the_issue.mitigation: Modify DialogOverlay in dialog.jsx to have 'pointer-events-none' or reduce z-index below DialogContent
